pg: Show off your secret talent.
Call a friend and tell them they are grounded for a week (make up a weird story to justify the punishment).
Hand over your phone to another player who can send a single text saying anything they want to anyone they want.
Act like your favorite disney character for the rest of the game.
Pick an object and write a detailed poem on it. send it to someone.
Go grab a broom and do your best tango.
Write a facebook or instagram (or other social media) post only using your toes.
Make a prank call to another best friend.
Do a plank for a full minute.
Set your cell phone language to chinese for the next 10 minutes.
Eat a packet of hot sauce straight.
Wear your shirt inside out for the rest of the day.
Open your wallet and explain all the things in it briefly.
Act like you do not understand your own language until your next turn (come up with your own language).
Start the most useless and random argument with a person from your dms.
Let the group choose a text to send to anyone in your dms.
Only use sign language for the next round.
Let the other players go through your phone for one minute.
Create a really bad, five-minute make-up tutorial and post it to YouTube.
Draw your favorite movie and have the other person guess it (pictionary-style).
Screenshare and let the group look at your dms (unless you can't show them for privacy reasons) for 2 minutes.
Make up a country song off the top of your head.
Close your eyes and write a text consisting of every single word that pops up in your mind without looking. send it to someone random and screenshot the conversation for proof.
Empty a glass of cold water onto your head outside.
Put five cubes in your mouth (you can't chew them, you just have to let them melt—brrr).
Ask a (random) person how much toilet paper they have in their bathroom.
Prank call or prank text someone of the group's choice.
Do an impression of another player until someone can figure out who it is.
Write a status on discord praising someone and keep it for the rest of the day.
Do an impression of your favorite celebrity.
Let another player pick someone from your dms to send one text.
Do an impression of someone until another player can guess who you are.
Send a representation of a movie/show in only emojis and make the rest of the group guess what it is.
Dump out your purse, backpack, or pockets and do a show and tell of what's inside.

Let another person draw a tattoo on your back with a permanent marker.
Pound on your chest and act like a gorilla for the next minute.
Let another person post a status on your behalf.
Say pickles at the end of every sentence you say until it's your turn again.
Say everything in caps for the next 10 minutes.

Go outside and wink at the first person you see.
Give a 3 minute stand-up comedy routine.
Demonstrate how you style your hair in the mirror (without actually using the mirror).
Make up a story about an item in your room.
End every text you send with lol for the next 5 minutes.
Get on all fours and act like a dog until your next turn.
Select someone of the same gender and text them about stuff only the same gender would get, non-stop, for 5 minutes.
Do 20 squats.
Text a stranger and tell them a made-up, wild secret.
Say two honest things about everyone else in the group.
Do a free-style rap for the next minute.
Send the 11th picture in your camera roll.
Text out the first word that comes to your mind right now.
Secretly choose someone in the group to act like for the next 5 minutes, or until someone guesses correctly who.
Say happy birthday to the last human in your dms.
Send someone the most unflattering picture of yourself on your phone.
Let another player choose your status for the next 12 hours.
Text in a different language of your choosing for 5 minutes.
Prank call a friend by acting as if you don't know them.
Imitate a youtube star until another player guesses who you're portraying.
Tell a friend that you got grounded for 2 months for something weird and post their reaction.
Be a commentator for 5 minutes.
Smell another player's bare foot.

Play air guitar for one minute.
Let the other players redo your hairstyle.
Pour water on your head.
In the next ten minutes, find a way to scare another player and make it a surprise.
Say "ya heard meh" after everything you say for the next 5 minutes.
Lay on the floor and act like a sizzling piece of bacon.
Be someone’s pet for the next 5 minutes.
End every text you send with not for the next 5 minutes.
Text your mom the last picture saved on your phone.
Pretend to be a cat for five minutes and send me a video.
Let someone give you a wedgie.
Only use your elbows and knees to go make a sandwich.
Use the letters of the name of another player to describe them (ex. sam : s – silly ; a – attractive ; m – merry)
Put on a blindfold and touch the other players' faces until you can figure out who's who.

Send out the first word that comes to your mind.

Give a deep explanation of one item in front of you.

Let the player to your right redo your makeup.

Let the group choose your status and keep it for 24 hours.

Serenade the person to your right for a full minute.
Use proper capitalization and punctuation on everything you text for the next 10 minutes.
Show the last five people you texted and what the messages said

Make a fake, funny strange dream and send it to someone.

Tell your top 5 dms that you have an important secret to tell them, and then don't answer.
Play a round of skribbl.io with [random user].
Sing a random song.
Call a friend, pretend it's their birthday, and sing them happy birthday to you.
Take a selfie standing next to the toilet and post it.

Use only emojis to speak for the next 5 minutes.

pg13: Tell a person of the group's choice your true feelings about them.
Call a pizza shop and ask if you can return a pizza.

Write a break-up text message and send it to a random person.

Call someone and sincerely tell them about your newfound love for justin bieber.

Shave a part of your body that you never shave.
Text the last person you called saying, “i love you”.
Make up and send a detailed love letter to someone of the group's choosing.
Pretend [random user] is breaking up with you. beg/plead/try to convince them to not leave you for another person.
If you have a crush on someone, tell them. (otherwise pick the last person you dmed)
Show the last five people you texted and what the messages said
Send a romantic text message to someone of the opposite gender of the group's choosing.
Send a pickup-line to a user of your choice of the opposite sex.
